topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Step 3 -Deploying In a KVM Cluster (Denver Deployment)

body.p: The first phase of the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade installation involves creating a bootstrapping the lifecycle manager VM and installation services. You will then deploy the Standard Region, which includes HP Helion OpenStack.

The installation uses Ansible playbooks to deploy the lifecycle manager VM. Ansible playbooks are files that contain scripts that execute required installation processes. You will then edit JSON files and use the HLM CLI to deploy the Standard Region.
